trends: There have been 2 other sightings in North Bergen
There were no other sightings in North Bergen on or around June 9th 1987
divs: Sighting Details1 In field 2 Dead silence foggy felt hollow and light 3 a couple of blimps 4 Came out of no were.hovered above us for 20 minutes 5 remembering more as time goes on Panic attacks started within weeks after.foggy memory.feeling of unease now 6 Silently moved straight forward into fog and rain into meadowlands swamp and feilds
Summary: appeared overhead on top of us.loss of memory.panic ever since.as time goes on memory comes clearer.t
